name: vMix Preset File
summary: A VMIX file is a preset file created by StudioCoast vMix, a live production and streaming application. It contains settings for a video broadcast, which include imported videos, audio tracks, graphics, effects, titles, and transitions. VMIX files also store technical settings, such as display, video and audio output, and web controller settings.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: VMIX file open in StudioCoast vMix 24
